posts.post_content:
I’m looking for postcards, photos, etc… of Babe Towne. He’s the only major leaguer from my hometown. He spent most of his career in the minor leagues throughout Iowa and Nebraska, but played a few games for the 1906 Chicago White Sox. I currently have this postcard, but would be interested in anything else that’s out there. Not sure exactly what exists. These were all the teams he played for:

1902 Rock Rapids Browns
1903 Des Moines Undertakers
1904 Des Moines Prohibitionists
1905 Des Moines Underwriters
1905 Milwaukee Brewers
1906 Des Moines Champs
1906 Chicago White Sox
1907 Minneapolis Millers
1907 Burlington Pathfinders
1909 Sioux City Packers
1910 Sioux City Packers
1911 Sioux City Packers
1912 Sioux City Packers
1914 Norfolk Drummers
1916 Fort Dodge Dodgers
